title: Background suppression in fluorescence nanoscopy with stimulated emission double depletion
title_cn: 激发发射双耗竭荧光纳米显微镜中的背景抑制
abstract: Stimulated emission depletion (STED) fluorescence nanoscopy is a powerful super-resolution imaging technique based on the confinement of fluorescence emission to the central subregion of an observation volume through de-excitation of fluorophores in the periphery via stimulated emission. Here, we introduce stimulated emission double depletion (STEDD) as a method to selectively remove artificial background intensity. In this approach, a first, conventional STED pulse is followed by a second, delayed Gaussian STED pulse that specifically depletes the central region, thus leaving only background. Thanks to time-resolved detection we can remove this background intensity voxel by voxel by taking the weighted difference of photons collected before and after the second STED pulse. STEDD thus yields background-suppressed super-resolved images as well as STED-based fluorescence correlation spectroscopy data. Furthermore, the proposed method is also beneficial when considering lower-power, less redshifted depletion pulses.
abstract_cn: 激发发射耗尽（STED）荧光纳米技术是一种强大的超分辨率成像技术，其基础是通过通过激发发射使外围的荧光团消光，将荧光发射限制在观察区域的中央子区域。在这里，我们介绍受激发射双耗（STEDD）作为选择性去除人工背景强度的方法。在这种方法中，第一个常规的STED脉冲之后是第二个延迟的高斯STED脉冲，该脉冲专门耗尽了中心区域，因此仅留下背景。由于采用了时间分辨检测，我们可以通过获取第二个STED脉冲之前和之后收集的光子的加权差，来逐个像素消除背景强度体素。因此，STEDD可以产生背景抑制的超分辨图像以及基于STED的荧光相关光谱数据。此外，该方法在考虑低功率，较少红移的耗尽脉冲时也是有益的。</ p>

title: Coherent backscattering of Raman light
title_cn: 拉曼光的相干反向散射
abstract: Coherent backscattering of light is observed when electromagnetic waves undergo multiple scattering within a disordered optical medium. So far, coherent backscattering of light has been studied extensively for elastic (or Rayleigh) light scattering. The occurrence of inelastic scattering affects the visibility of the backscattering effect by reducing the degree of optical coherence in the diffusion process. Here, we discuss the first experimental observation of a constructive interference effect in the inelastically backscattered Raman radiation from strongly diffusing silicon nanowire random media. The observed phenomenon originates from the coherent nature of the Raman scattering process, which typically occurs on a scale given by the phonon coherence length. We interpret our results in the context of a theoretical model of mixed Rayleigh–Raman random walks to shed light on the role of phase coherence in multiple scattering phenomena.
abstract_cn: 当电磁波在无序的光学介质中经历多次散射时，观察到光的相干反向散射。 迄今为止，已经对光的相干反向散射进行了广泛的研究，以用于弹性（或瑞利）光散射。 通过减少扩散过程中的光学相干程度，非弹性散射的发生会影响反向散射效果的可见性。 在这里，我们讨论了在来自强扩散硅纳米线随机介质的非弹性反向散射拉曼辐射中的相长干涉效应的第一个实验观察。 观察到的现象源自拉曼散射过程的相干特性，通常发生在声子相干长度给定的尺度上。 我们在混合瑞利随机拉曼理论模型的背景下解释我们的结果，以阐明相位相干在多重散射现象中的作用。</ p>

title: Highly efficient luminescent solar concentrators based on earth-abundant indirect-bandgap silicon quantum dots
title_cn: 基于富含地球的间接带隙硅量子点的高效发光太阳能聚光器
abstract: Building-integrated photovoltaics is gaining consensus as a renewable energy technology for producing electricity at the point of use. Luminescent solar concentrators (LSCs) could extend architectural integration to the urban environment by realizing electrode-less photovoltaic windows. Crucial for large-area LSCs is the suppression of reabsorption losses, which requires emitters with negligible overlap between their absorption and emission spectra. Here, we demonstrate the use of indirect-bandgap semiconductor nanostructures such as highly emissive silicon quantum dots. Silicon is non-toxic, low-cost and ultra-earth-abundant, which avoids the limitations to the industrial scaling of quantum dots composed of low-abundance elements. Suppressed reabsorption and scattering losses lead to nearly ideal LSCs with an optical efficiency of η = 2.85%, matching state-of-the-art semi-transparent LSCs. Monte Carlo simulations indicate that optimized silicon quantum dot LSCs have a clear path to η > 5% for 1 m2 devices. We are finally able to realize flexible LSCs with performances comparable to those of flat concentrators, which opens the way to a new design freedom for building-integrated photovoltaics elements.
abstract_cn: 建筑集成的光伏作为一种可再生能源技术已在使用时产生电能，已获得共识。发光太阳能集中器（LSC）可以通过实现无电极光伏窗口来将建筑集成扩展到城市环境。对于大面积LSC至关重要的是抑制重吸收损失，这要求发射器的吸收光谱和发射光谱之间的重叠可以忽略不计。在这里，我们演示了间接带隙半导体纳米结构的使用，例如高发射硅量子点。硅是无毒的，低成本的和超丰富的地球，它避免了对由低丰度元素组成的量子点在工业规模上的限制。抑制的重吸收和散射损失可导致近乎理想的LSC，其光学效率为2.85％，与最新的半透明LSC相匹配。蒙特卡罗模拟表明，对于1＆m = 8197; m 2 器件，优化的硅量子点LSC具有通向5％的清晰路径。我们终于能够实现性能与平面集中器相当的灵活LSC，这为建筑集成光伏元件的新设计自由度开辟了道路。

title: Ultrahigh-definition dynamic 3D holographic display by active control of volume speckle fields
title_cn: 主动控制体积散斑场的超高清动态3D全息显示器
abstract: Holographic displays generate realistic 3D images that can be viewed without the need for any visual aids. They operate by generating carefully tailored light fields that replicate how humans see an actual environment. However, the realization of high-performance, dynamic 3D holographic displays has been hindered by the capabilities of present wavefront modulator technology. In particular, spatial light modulators have a small diffraction angle range and limited pixel number limiting the viewing angle and image size of a holographic 3D display. Here, we present an alternative method to generate dynamic 3D images by controlling volume speckle fields significantly enhancing image definition. We use this approach to demonstrate a dynamic display of micrometre-sized optical foci in a volume of 8 mm × 8 mm × 20 mm.
abstract_cn: 全息显示生成逼真的3D图像，无需任何视觉辅助即可查看。 它们通过产生精心定制的光场来工作，这些光场复制了人类如何看待实际环境。 但是，目前的波前调制器技术的功能阻碍了高性能，动态3D全息显示器的实现。 特别地，空间光调制器具有小的衍射角范围和有限的像素数，从而限制了全息3D显示器的视角和图像尺寸。 在这里，我们介绍了一种通过控制体积斑点场显着增强图像清晰度来生成动态3D图像的替代方法。 我们使用这种方法来演示在8毫米的体积中动态显示微米级光学焦点的情况。8毫米的光学焦点的体积为8毫米。 ; 20＆＃8197; mm。

title: Charge-integrating organic heterojunction phototransistors for wide-dynamic-range image sensors
title_cn: 用于宽动态范围图像传感器的电荷积分有机异质结光电晶体管
abstract: Solution-processed phototransistors can substantially advance the performance of image sensors. Phototransistors exhibit large photoconductive gain and a sublinear responsivity to irradiance, which enables a logarithmic sensing of irradiance that is akin to the human eye and has a wider dynamic range than photodiode-based image sensors. Here, we present a novel solution-processed phototransistor composed of a heterostructure between a high-mobility organic semiconductor and an organic bulk heterojunction. The device efficiently integrates photogenerated charge during the period of a video frame then quickly discharges it, which significantly increases the signal-to-noise ratio compared with sampling photocurrent during readout. Phototransistor-based image sensors processed without photolithography on plastic substrates integrate charge with external quantum efficiencies above 100% at 100 frames per second. In addition, the sublinear responsivity to irradiance of these devices enables a wide dynamic range of 103 dB at 30 frames per second, which is competitive with state-of-the-art image sensors.
abstract_cn: 经过溶液处理的光电晶体管可以大大提高图像传感器的性能。光电晶体管表现出大的光电导增益和对辐照度的亚线性响应，与基于光电二极管的图像传感器相比，它可以对数感应出类似于人眼的辐照度，并具有更宽的动态范围。在这里，我们提出了一种由高迁移率有机半导体和有机体异质结之间的异质结构组成的新型溶液处理光电晶体管。该器件在视频帧期间有效地积分了光生电荷，然后迅速将其放电，与读出期间采样光电流相比，显着提高了信噪比。在塑料基板上未经光刻处理的基于光电晶体管的图像传感器以每秒100帧的速度将电荷与高于100％的外部量子效率集成在一起。此外，这些设备对辐照度的亚线性响应能力使它能够以每秒30帧的速度在103 dB的动态范围内工作，这与最新的图像传感器相比具有竞争优势。</ p>

title: Electric field-induced second-order nonlinear optical effects in silicon waveguides
title_cn: 电场引起的硅波导中的二阶非线性光学效应
abstract: The symmetry of crystalline silicon inhibits a second-order optical nonlinear susceptibility, χ(2), in complementary metal–oxide–semiconductor-compatible silicon photonic platforms. However, χ(2) is required for important processes such as phase-only modulation, second-harmonic generation (SHG) and sum/difference frequency generation. Here, we break the crystalline symmetry by applying direct-current fields across p–i–n junctions in silicon ridge waveguides and induce a χ(2) proportional to the large χ(3) of silicon. The obtained χ(2) is first used to perturb the permittivity (the direct-current Kerr effect) and achieve phase-only modulation. Second, the spatial distribution of χ(2) is altered by periodically patterning p–i–n junctions to quasi-phase-match pump and second-harmonic modes and realize SHG. We measure a maximum SHG efficiency of P2ω/Pω2 = 13 ± 0.5% W−1 at λω = 2.29 µm and with field-induced χ(2) = 41 ± 1.5 pm V–1. We expect such field-induced χ(2) in silicon to lead to a new class of complex integrated devices such as carrier-envelope offset frequency stabilizers, terahertz generators, optical parametric oscillators and chirp-free modulators.
